Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Iti (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)): “Imi vasingatendi (muna Allah, muhumwechete wavo, ngirozi dzavo, Mabhuku avo, vatumwa vavo, muzuva rekutongwa, uye kuti zvose zvinoitika nokuda kwavo (Allah)
Kwamuri mune chitendero chenyu, uye ini kwandiri ndine chitendero changu.”
